Row.Text: Each source of [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble and [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources improved with a Quarry.
Stone Works can only be constructed in a city near an improved [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone or [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble resource. Stone Works increase a city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] production.

Alle Quellen von [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marmor und [ICON_RES_STONE] Stein, die von dieser Stadt bearbeitet werden, generieren +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Produktion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Die Stadt muss mindestens eine dieser Ressourcen mit einem Steinbruch verbessern.
